name: Boxed In (itch) (Skeep)
description:
Summary

Players need to find all of the puzzle boxes hidden within the room to win. These can be hidden in the room or within other puzzle boxes. Resize the puzzle boxes to find them all.

Controls

W,A,S,D – Move around

Space – Jump

Left Mouse – Grow Target

Right Mouse – Shrink Target

F – Pick up / place down blocks

Q, E – Rotate held block

Mouse Wheel – Flip held block

Left Shift, Right Shift – Inspect the held block

Escape – Quit

I'm Stuck :(

A full playthrough can be seen here
